channel.title: Fylde on News Lancashire
channel.description: Recent content in Fylde on News Lancashire

item.title: Blackpool and The Fylde College offers excellent courses that equip young people with the skills to work with the vital...
item.description: Blackpool and The Fylde College offers excellent courses that equip young people with the skills to work with the vital renewable energy equipment we need for the future. I asked the Secretary of State to meet me to discuss how we can create those jobs right here in Blackpool?

item.title: Poulton-le-Fylde man jailed after police find cocaine and heroin in drugs raid
item.description: A Poulton-le-Fylde man has been jailed for five years after police found cocaine and heroin during a drugs warrant at his home. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: Rossall School targets international growth with new admissions director
item.description: Experienced education specialist switches Dubai for the Fylde Coast Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: 11 of the most interesting plans submitted across Fylde recently inc changes to leisure parks
item.description: Take a look below at the most interesting planning applications submitted to Fylde Borough Council last week. Source: LEP Preston

item.title: 13 of the best places to get winter warming soup in and around Blackpool according to TripAdvisor
item.description: As the winter chill bites nothing hits the spot quite like a steaming bowl of soup from hearty classics to inventive creation, Blackpool and the Fylde coast has it all. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: AFC Fylde players stuck to their plan well to pick up three points
item.description: Craig Mahon said victory was all that mattered after watching his AFC Fylde players return to winning ways in midweek. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: Blackpool North and Fleetwood MP backs tighter restrictions on dog breeding after influx of concerns
item.description: A Fylde coast MP has joined calls to improve the breeding standards for dogs and an end to the misery caused by extreme breeding. Source: Blackpool Gazette

item.title: 'This is a joke...residents deserve better' - Councillor hits out over LCC's stance on Lytham tip traffic
item.description: A row has broken out over traffic at Lytham tip - with Lancashire County Council’s stance branded ‘a joke’. Source: LEP Preston
